attributes.action: Scrap the BBC license fee. The BBC is not impartial politically and wastes money
attributes.additional_details: Gary Lineker tweets and claims, Chris Evans and Graham Norton’s shows both support the EU remain camp. BBC QT appears to prefer remain panel participants.
attributes.background: We are repeatedly bombarded with EU remain propaganda and would prefer an impartial entertainment that I pay for. If the BBC wishes to educate politically, it should not cost.
